name: 朱尼尔·阿拉比
name_full: 朱尼尔·阿拉比 Junior Alabi
introduction: Junior Alabi is a dynamic actor and dancer with a rich blend of Latin and Asian heritage. Raised in San Francisco and now based in Los Angeles, Junior has worked onscreen and onstage extensively across the US, Canada, and abroad.Starting out in dance, Junior's skills quickly found a place on popular TV shows and movies like Chef directed by Jon Favreau, Disney's Austin and Ally, Shake It Up, CW's Jane the Virgin, Univision's Mira Quien Baila and the Oscars. His passion for the arts is evident in every performance, where he combines athleticism with heartfelt emotion to create memorable experiences.Junior has an upcoming role as a series regular in a new CPIC original series set for release in Winter 2024. He's also appeared in films such as 4 Horsemen: Apocalypse and the series Day-bi-day. His talents also extend to voice acting, with a notable role in Amazon Studios' international series Dom Season 3.Junior is represented by Anthony Leones at Shushu Entertainment & Management for Theatrical and Bloc Agency for on-camera commercial/dance and choreography.He looks forward to continuing his journey in the entertainment industry, always eager to bring his best to every opportunity.
